Package com.cmpt213.gameLogic

Class GameGrid

java.lang.Object
com.cmpt213.gameLogic.GameGrid
public class GameGrid extends Object
The `GameGrid` class represents the game grid for the Tokimon finder game. It manages the grid cells, player's position, and game state.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameGrid(int numToki, int numFoki)
    Constructs a new `GameGrid` with the specified number of Tokimons and Fokimons.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameGrid

      public GameGrid(int numToki, int numFoki)
      Constructs a new `GameGrid` with the specified number of Tokimons and Fokimons.
      Parameters:
      numToki - The number of Tokimons on the grid.
      numFoki - The number of Fokimons on the grid.

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      public Cell[][] getGrid()
      Retrieves the game grid.
      Returns:
      The 2D array representing the game grid.

    • getVisited

      public boolean[][] getVisited()
      Retrieves the visited cells array.
      Returns:
      The 2D array representing visited cells.

    • getNumToki

      public int getNumToki()
      Retrieves the total number of Tokimons in the game.
      Returns:
      The number of Tokimons.

    • getCollectedToki

      public int getCollectedToki()
      Retrieves the number of Tokimons collected by the player.
      Returns:
      The number of collected Tokimons.

    • collctedTokiIncrease

      public void collctedTokiIncrease()
      Increases the count of collected Tokimons by 1.

    • getPlayerPosition

      public Position getPlayerPosition()
      Retrieves the player's current position on the grid.
      Returns:
      The `Position` object representing the player's position.

    • initializeGrid

      public void initializeGrid(int playerInitialRow, int playerInitialColumn)
      Initializes the game grid by randomly placing Tokimons, Fokimons, and empty cells, and sets the player's initial position.
      Parameters:
      playerInitialRow - The initial row for the player.
      playerInitialColumn - The initial column for the player.

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(String direction)
      Moves the player in the specified direction and updates the player's position and game state.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which the player should move ("W" for up, "A" for left, "S" for down, "D" for right).

    • teleportPlayer

      public void teleportPlayer(int row, int column)
      Teleports the player to the specified row and column, updating the player's position and game state.
      Parameters:
      row - The new row for the player.
      column - The new column for the player.

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited(int row, int col)
      Checks if a specific cell on the grid has been visited by the player.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      `true` if the cell has been visited, `false` otherwise.

    • setVisited

      public void setVisited(int row, int col)
      Marks a specific cell on the grid as visited.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell to mark.
      col - The column of the cell to mark.

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(int row, int col)
      Retrieves the cell at the specified row and column on the grid.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      The `Cell` object representing the cell at the specified location.

    • isGameWon

      public boolean isGameWon()
      Checks if the game has been won by the player.
      Returns:
      `true` if the player has collected all Tokimons, `false` otherwise.

    • isGameLost

      public boolean isGameLost()
      Checks if the game has been lost by the player.
      Returns:
      `true` if the player has landed on a Fokimon cell, `false` otherwise.
